name: OpenThesaurus Tool
semantic_context: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API
natural_language_description: 这是 OpenThesaurus Tool 节点。主要用于: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getSynonyms
available_options: Get Synonyms (值: getSynonyms) - Get synonyms for a German word in German

text.name: text
text.description: The word to get synonyms for
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The word to get synonyms for | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: baseform (值: None) - Specifies the basic form for the search term if it is not already a basic form
similar (值: None) - This also returns up to five similarly written words for each answer. This is useful to be able to make a suggestion to the user in the event of a possible typing error.
startswith (值: None) - Like substring = true, but only finds words that begin with the specified search term
substring (值: None) - Whether up to ten words are returned for each answer that only contain the search term as a partial word
substringFromResults (值: None) - Specifies from which entry the partial word hits are to be returned. Only works together with substring = true.
substringMaxResults (值: None) - Specifies how many partial word hits should be returned in total. Only works together with substring = true.
subsynsets (值: None) - Whether each synonym group has its (optional) sub-terms supplied
supersynsets (值: None) - Whether each synonym group is supplied with its (optional) generic terms
